definitions: (of a vehicle) collide violently with an obstacle or another vehicle.
Cause (a vehicle) to collide violently with something.
(of an aircraft) fall from the sky and hit the land or sea.
Cause (an aircraft) to fall from the sky.
Move or cause to move with force, speed, and sudden loud noise.
(of shares, a business, etc.) suddenly drop in value or fail.
Be heavily defeated in a sporting competition.
(of a computer, computing system, or software) fail suddenly.
(of a patient) suffer a cardiac arrest.
Enter (a party) without an invitation; gatecrash.
Go to sleep, especially suddenly or in an improvised setting.
